name: Tap Hero Adventures
description:
Help the heroes escape the darkest dungeon!

Enjoy Tap Hero Adventures, an arcade game where you control a character only with on tap! You are trapped in the dungeon and the craziest monster chases you! Your task is quite simple - run as fast as possible and do your best to leave this place!

In Tap Hero Adventures you will see an outstanding art of cube pixel world, a lot of characters to play and many dangerous traps on your way! You gotta be fast and decide where to step next! Evade the obstacles, monsters and traps! Collect coins and unlock new skins! The greatest adventure begins now!

Tap Hero Adventures game features:
-Fantastic pixel dungeon
-A lot of skins!
-Traps, monsters and obstacles
-Arcade, logic runner game

If you want a real challenge than Tap Hero Adventures is exactly what you are going to like! Try you logic and reaction skill! Good luck!
